org.michailov.async.io

Class LineAsyncOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.michailov.async.AsyncOptions
      • org.michailov.async.io.CharsetAsyncOptions
        • org.michailov.async.io.LineAsyncOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextStreamAsyncOptions

    public class LineAsyncOptions
extends CharsetAsyncOptions
    Options that control the execution of async line splitting and ending.

        public static final java.lang.String SYSTEM

      • DEFAULT_ESTIMATED_LINE_LENGTH

        public static final int DEFAULT_ESTIMATED_LINE_LENGTH
        Default estimated line length in chars - 1024 chars.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • lineBreak

        public java.lang.String lineBreak
        Sequence of chars that gets appended to each line. The default is SYSTEM.

      • estimatedLineLength

        public int estimatedLineLength
        Estimated line length in chars. This value is used to initialize the input StringBuilder. A line may exceed this value. No content will be lost. Only a re-allocation will occur. The default is DEFAULT_ESTIMATED_LINE_LENGTH.
